title: Ex-tech Sicen Sun made replica guns in lounge room using 3D printer, court hears – The Sydney Morning Herald
text:
The Sydney Morning Herald Ex-tech Sicen Sun made replica guns in lounge room using 3D printer, court hears The Sydney Morning Herald A global advertising firm staff member who allegedly built guns using a 3D printer in his Sydney apartment developed a hobby that "got out of hand", a court has heard. Former Apple computers tech Sicen Sun, 27, was charged with firearms offences on … Call of Duty fan charged over making guns from video games using 3D printer dailytelegraph.com.au Video game 'fanboy' bailed after police found six 3D printed guns in his home The Australian 3D guns accused manufacturer was a 'science fiction fanboy', court hears ABC Online NEWS.com.au – Daily Mail – 9news.com.au – Computerworld Australia all 14 news articles » from Google News – Australia … Read the story in F3News
